channel.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
channel.description:
Hey guys i have posted a topic on this before but never really understood replys.
I am wondering how to change the xp rate in my server, it is really realy fast and i would like to slow it down....
If it is possible can some 1 make like a little reply mini guide to help me threw it thanks.

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-specz Deadly-specz
item.source: How to change the xp rate in server?

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Deadly-specz:

ok, umm kinda getting it, btw you got msn? maybe you could help me code a few things ill make you admin

PM your MSN, and I’ll have this XP problem resolved in minutes, regardless of working on my own server.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Deadly-specz, post:12, topic:273736”]ok, umm kinda getting it, btw you got msn? maybe you could help me code a few things ill make you admin[/quote]Uhm sorry, i’m already busy with my server, i’m busy enough let alone having time for being admin on other servers, thanks for the offer though, you can add Sara@slygaming.com, I might be able to help you with a few things, and maybe be admin in my spare time,

Thanks,
Denoria.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Deadly-specz, post:9, topic:273736”]well idk the xp all i know is if i cook like 1 sharks its 100K xp! i hate it… so let me seeeeee ill go to java, then just control F, then search 800?[/quote]no search 100000000, if cook is exactly 100000000 xp per shark, or it might be in item.cfg, idk lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the xp rate in server?

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Just search == 383… Eventually, you’ll find the method for using a raw shark with whatever, and under it will most likely be the exp given. If not, it’ll tell you the method that gives the exp.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-specz Deadly-specz
item.description:
@Deadly-specz wrote:

well idk the xp all i know is if i cook like 1 sharks its 100K xp! i hate it… so let me seeeeee ill go to java, then just control F, then search 800?

I am getting 4000 xp per hit

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the xp rate in server?

item.title: How to change the xp rate in server?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Deadly-specz, post:7, topic:273736”]ok so i go to clietn java, then look for what? whats the code look like…[/quote]Search how much exp you get per hit now, and when your in client.java do ctrl + f, then put the amount of xp,
ok say i was wanting to change the xp rate of str, and its currently 800 and i want it to 500 per hit, i would open client.java, search for 800 and if it says something like skill there, i would know its the exp rate, and i would change 800 to 500.

Thanks,
Denoria.

Read full topic

@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Deadly-specz, post:1, topic:273736”]Hey guys i have posted a topic on this before but never really understood replys.

I am wondering how to change the xp rate in my server, it is really realy fast and i would like to slow it down…

If it is possible can some 1 make like a little reply mini guide to help me threw it thanks.[/quote]Open your server file “Client.java” then search the current xp you get from a hit.
